SetLock.name: SetLock
SetLock.description: Set the lock to the current inline text content control. "contentLocked" - content cannot be edited. "sdtContentLocked" - content cannot be edited and BlockLvlSdt cannot be deleted. "sdtLocked" - BlockLvlSdt cannot be deleted.

params.name: sLockType
params.description: The lock type applied to the inline text content control.

GetLock.name: GetLock
GetLock.description: Get the lock type of this container.

SetTag.name: SetTag
SetTag.description: Add a string tag to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sTag
params.description: The tag which will be added to the current inline text content control.

GetTag.name: GetTag
GetTag.description: Get the tag attribute for this container.

SetLabel.name: SetLabel
SetLabel.description: Add a string label to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The label which will be added to the current inline text content control. Can be a positive or negative integer from -2147483647 to 2147483647.

GetLabel.name: GetLabel
GetLabel.description: Get the label attribute for this container.

SetAlias.name: SetAlias
SetAlias.description: Set the alias attribute for this container.

params.name: sAlias
params.description: The alias which will be added to the current inline text content control.

GetAlias.name: GetAlias
GetAlias.description: Get the alias attribute for this container.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Get the number of elements in the current inline text content control. The text content control is created with one text run present in it by default, so even without any element added this method will return the value of '1'.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Get the element of the current inline text content control using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the element which content we want to get must be located.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Remove the element using the position specified from the current inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element which we want to remove from the current inline text content control.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Remove all the elements from the current inline text content control.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add an element to the inline text content control.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the position specified. Returns false if the type of oElement is not supported by an inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element where it will be added to the current inline text content control. If this value is not specified, then the element will be added to the end of the current inline text content control.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Add an element to the end of inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Add text to the current content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the content control.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Remove content control and content. If keepContent is true, the content is not deleted.

params.name: keepContent
params.description: Specifies if the content will be deleted or not.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Apply text settings to content of content control.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the content of content control.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Get the content control that contains the current content control.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Get the table that contains the content control.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Get the table cell that contains the content control.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Return a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified content control.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Create a copy of an inline content control. Ingonore comments, footnote references, complex fields.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a container for the paragraph elements.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a container for the paragraph elements.
